title: Reformed??

This behavior IS reliably punished. It's just dependent on their past behavior and future behavior for *exactly* when that happens. You also may not get an alert when a punishment goes out.
Out of topic but you are the only one I can ask this to: where do i go to complain about a certain moderator,and general moderation?

> [{quoted}](name=R107 Games,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=y6oai4ol,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2018-10-21T18:30:48.777+0000)
>
> Out of topic but you are the only one I can ask this to: where do i go to complain about a certain moderator,and general moderation?

The moderation Discord for the former, Discuss the Boards or the discord for the latter.

You are judged based on your own chat. If someone else is flaming, you should mute and report. 

If they are getting away with it, it's only because people aren't reporting them. It does absolutely no good, ever, to flame them back. I have never seen flaming someone be effective. Simply no reason to do it.

Can you comment on the (roundabout) amount of games it would take for honor to get unlocked? I've played 35 games without so much as a single negative message. The only things I am saying is "gl hf, gg wp, and nice play". In post-game lobby I will say things "like fun game guys!, wp everyone"

It seems wrong that I am being as positive as possible and I can't even get honor unlocked.

I was checkpoint 3 of Honor level 2 with ~600 games.
While being low-key toxic, but not bannable, the best way to get your honor level back is to spam normal queue, play very poorly and surrender at 15 or 20. You could probably get back to Honor level 2 by end of season if you did 8 hours a day of that. 

Pro-tip: If you can find 3-4 other people looking to raise their honor level, it'll go even faster since you can ensure the surrender vote is successful everytime and then honor each other afterwards.

normally, with a clean record, no. not worth of a punishment.
in your case, since you're in 'hot water' so to say, yes. worthy of a punishment and rightfully punished.
I think the game chat is fine but the post-game is not.
I don't see anything wrong with this.

These logs are considered mild in severity. For you to be punished for this, you'll have to have displayed consistent behavior.  

If you don't k ow what you did wrong, let me list it out for you:

1. Defeatist attitude by saying you are done.
2. Calling/threatening for reports with the intention to get someone punished. This classified as harassment.
3. Blaming teammates. 
4. Age shaming by calling them kid as an insult. 
5. Non-productive spam in the form of complaints.

Even if you show such behavior 1/20 games, that's 5% of the games you are toxic considered quite high already. You probably did this over a couple dozens of games for you to get punished.
